briefdescription.para: Print a help message for pseudo dot-bracket structure constraint characters to stdout. (constraint support is specified by option parameter)

detaileddescription.para: Currently available options are: VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_PIPE (paired with another base) VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_DOT (no constraint at all) VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_X (base must not pair) VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_ANG_BRACK (paired downstream/upstream) VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_RND_BRACK (base i pairs base j) pass a collection of options as one value like this: vrna_message_constraints(option_1 | option_2 | option_n)

simplesect.para: vrna_message_constraint_options_all(), vrna_constraints_add(), VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_PIPE, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_DOT, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_X, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_ANG_BRACK, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_RND_BRACK, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_INTERMOL, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_INTRAMOL

parameterdescription.para: Option switch that tells which constraint help will be printed

briefdescription.para: Print structure constraint characters to stdout (full constraint support)

simplesect.para: vrna_message_constraint_options(), vrna_constraints_add(), VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_PIPE, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_DOT, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_X, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_ANG_BRACK, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_RND_BRACK, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_INTERMOL, VRNA_CONSTRAINT_DB_INTRAMOL

briefdescription.para: Flag for vrna_constraints_add() to indicate that constraints are present in a text file.
Indicate generation of constraints for MFE folding.

xrefdescription.para: This flag has no meaning anymore, since constraints are now always stored! (since v2.2.6)

briefdescription.para: Indicate generation of constraints for partition function computation.
Flag passed to generic softt constraints callback to indicate hairpin loop decomposition step.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a hairpin loop enclosed by the base pair $(i,j)$.
decomp_hp.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for interior loop decomposition step.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an interior loop enclosed by the base pair $(i,j)$, and enclosing the base pair $(k,l)$.
decomp_il.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for multibranch loop decomposition step.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop enclosed by the base pair $(i,j)$, and consisting of some enclosed multi loop content from k to l.
decomp_ml.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into two multibranch loop parts $[i:k]$, and $[l:j]$.
decomp_ml_ml_ml.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be considered a single stem branching off with base pair $(k,l)$.
decomp_ml_stem.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into a (usually) smaller multibranch loop part $[k:l]$.
decomp_ml_ml.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be considered a multibranch loop part that only consists of unpaired nucleotides.
decomp_ml_up.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will decomposed into a multibranch loop part $[i:k]$, and a stem with enclosing base pair $(l,j)$.
decomp_ml_ml_stem.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, where two stems with enclosing pairs $(i,k)$ and $(l,j)$ are coaxially stacking onto each other.
decomp_ml_coaxial.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of multibranch loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates a multibranch loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, where two stems with enclosing pairs $(i,k)$ and $(l,j)$ are coaxially stacking onto each other.
decomp_ml_coaxial.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into a (usually) smaller exterior loop part $[k:l]$.
decomp_ext_ext.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be considered as an exterior loop component consisting of only unpaired nucleotides.
decomp_ext_up.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be considered a stem with enclosing pair $(k,l)$.
decomp_ext_stem.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into two exterior loop parts $[i:k]$ and $[l:j]$.
decomp_ext_ext_ext.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into a stem branching off with base pair $(i,k)$, and an exterior loop part $[l:j]$.
decomp_ext_stem_ext.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.
Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into an exterior loop part $[i:k]$, and a stem branching off with base pair $(l,j)$.
decomp_ext_ext_stem.svg

briefdescription.para: Indicator for decomposition of exterior loop part.

detaileddescription.para: This flag notifies the soft or hard constraint callback function that the current decomposition step evaluates an exterior loop part in the interval $[i:j]$, which will be decomposed into an exterior loop part $[i:k]$, and a stem branching off with base pair $(l,j-1)$.
decomp_ext_ext_stem1.svg
